long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension provides seamless integration between Google Calendar and SimPro Calendar, allowing users to efficiently manage their events and schedules.

Key Features:

Calendar Synchronization: Automatically import events from Google Calendar to SimPro and vice versa.
Event Management: Easily add, edit, and delete events directly from the extension.
Calendar List Retrieval: View all available Google calendars and select which ones to work with.
Change Notifications: Receive instant alerts about updates in your calendars.
This extension saves you time and enhances your schedule organization by combining the functionalities of Google Calendar and SimPro into one convenient interface.
